overview: Along this never-ending, sun drenched stretch of desert highway, the women are beautiful and eager to please!  Country girls Tori Black, Krissy Lynn, Alanah Rae and more continue this journey in the second installment of the erotic best seller. Visually seductive with amazing locales, cool cars and the hottest honeys on the open road, Sunshine Highway 2 is an erotic fantasy come to life!
title: Sunshine Highway 2
